localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Veganzone is a new mobile application where people who follow vegan & vegetarian lifestyle can share their common values, meet each other, socialize over the events they create and purchase vegan products.
nodes.title: Veganzone - By vegans for vegans and vegetarians
nodes.author: Murat Aksu

nodes.excerpt: Have you seen that people are starting to change their profile picture in Clubhouse saying that they are in radio mode or listening? That is exactly what Clubhouse Tools does. It is a web app where you can set up your status through your profile picture.
nodes.title: Clubhouse Tools - Set up your Clubhouse status
nodes.author: Gabriel Perales

nodes.excerpt: Create a professional online newsroom. In addition to all the features from Ghost, it has some essential features that turn it into a professional online newsroom such as media kits, press clippings, built-in multi-language capabilities and newsletter options.
nodes.title: Pressbase - Create professional online newsroom for free
nodes.author: Hamen Wen

nodes.excerpt: B.E.P. or Backendless Ecommerce Platform turns any website into a shop with just 1-line of code, no backend or CMS required. Plus, it's free, minus standard processing fees (2.9% + $0.30, per transaction).
nodes.title: B.E.P. - Launch a shop with 1-line of code, no CMS required
nodes.author: surgieboi

nodes.excerpt: Build, share, and track interactive product demos that excite prospects and close more deals. â†’ No engineering required with our no-code solution! â†’ Build engaging feature overviews to share with leads â†’ Share a dynamic leave-behind after the sales call
nodes.title: Navattic - Create shareable product demos
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Huge re-design on Failory + 2 new projects: - Amazon Cemetery: Analyses of why +50 Amazon projects failed - Tools: Collection of +80 tools for startup founders.
nodes.title: Failory 3.0 - All-in-one content site for startup founders
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: We built this product to let you receive your packages at a nearby pickup point...no more worrying about package theft, missed deliveries, or planning your day around when the delivery man is coming. We have ~1,000 locations all around the country.
nodes.title: Bounce Package Acceptance - Ship your packages to a nearby shop
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: It takes hours to find a code snippet or tutorial that actually works. And double that when you search for it again. We help you save & access your code in less than 5 secs with our web app, Chrome & IDE extensions. Just right-click and save!
nodes.title: thiscodeWorks - Save and share code that works
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz â›„ï¸

nodes.excerpt: Milk Video is a web app for marketers to turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes. Effortlessly clip, caption, and design recordings to share the best moments in engaging videos. YC W21
nodes.title: Milk Video - Turn webinars into designed video highlights in minutes
nodes.author: Gustaf AlstrÃ¶mer

nodes.excerpt: Meet Lola AI, your new smart writing assistant that transforms bullet-points into clear, complete and compelling emails!
nodes.title: Lola AI - AI-powered emails in seconds
nodes.author: Albert Tamman

nodes.excerpt: Skizzle is a chrome extension for Gmail that makes end-to-end encryption dead easy - No passwords to remember, share or manage - Send encrypted attachments to any Gmail address - Verify file access on a public blockchain - Generous Free Forever plan
nodes.title: Skizzle - End-to-end encrypted attachments in Gmail
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: DPO-as-a-Service at Legal Nodes is 5 times more efficient than a DPO in-house. The monthly package includes: â—‹ designation of a DPO at your company; â—‹ 2 requests from your users; â—‹ 2 30-min consultations; â—‹ a tailored GDPR roadmap; â—‹ 3 document templates.
nodes.title: DPO as a Service - GDPR compliance with DPO as a Service
nodes.author: Margarita Sivakova

nodes.excerpt: FaceCode is the most intelligent coding interview tool ever built. It's helps interviewers make objective hiring decisions with ease, speed and accuracy.
nodes.title: FaceCode 2.0 - The best coding interview tool ever built
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: TeenUP was created to give kids a platform to learn new skills each day from their peers. The app allows kids to quickly and easily create short, unique, educational videos to share with friends and the world.
nodes.title: TeenUp - A learning platform designed for teens by teens
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Personality Illustrations is a pack of 40 diverse and fun avatars to supercharge your project. Download for free now!
nodes.title: Personality Illustrations - 40 free diverse avatars to supercharge your projects
nodes.author: Andy Dao

nodes.excerpt: A single place to store your customer feedback, manage it and act upon it! Try out our new feedback widget to catch customer feedback right inside your app!
nodes.title: ProdCamp Feedback Widget - Nail your customer feedback
nodes.author: Anton Zorin

nodes.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
nodes.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning
nodes.author: Sungho Yahng

nodes.excerpt: With http://djaty.com/, anyone can professionally report. And no more bugs reproduction! Report includes: Screenshots Steps Clicks Logs Browser aspect Network state Background exceptions Machine aspect The line code caused the bug Integrations: Slack Jira Gitlab
nodes.title: Djaty - Auto bug reporting tool while development and production
nodes.author: Abdulrahman Fakhrany

nodes.excerpt: Amaze your friends with GIFs of historical figures that are ready to use on Giphy.com. At yadada.app, we used a great AI tool from Rosebud AI to map 15 emotions to 30 historical figures like Shakespeare, Tesla, Franklin (full list in the comments).
nodes.title: Historical Animated GIFs - Over 500 animated GIFs of talking historical figures
nodes.author: Jan A. Kolar

nodes.title: Teamo 2.0 - Designed for the group, built for the celebration

nodes.excerpt: Google Fonts gets new logo as catalog adds iconography, starting with Material Icons.
nodes.title: Google Fonts Icons - Google Fonts now supports icons
nodes.author: David Haddad

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
nodes.title: Soapbox Minis - Social audio just got a whole lot better, with mini games
nodes.author: Dean Eigenmann

nodes.excerpt: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
nodes.title: Akin - Replace personas with data driven clusters through surveys
nodes.author: Sam Straun
